Detailed Description

Main window class.

Tonatiuh's main window class. It includes the menu bars and all the actions, signals and slots to provide user interaction with the program.

Definition at line 73 of file MainWindow.h.

bool MainWindow::Save ( ) [slot]

Returns true if the tonatiuh model is correctly saved in the current file. Otherwise, returns false.

If a current file is not defined, it calls to SaveAs funtios.

See also:
